name: Slime Rancher: VR Playground
summary: Experience the adorable slimes of Slime Rancher - in VR! Slime Rancher: VR Playground is a standalone experience based off of the world of Slime Rancher! Vac, feed, and play with slimes like never before! Explore three VR playgrounds based off of the Dry Reef, Moss Blanket, and Ancient Ruins. Get face-to-face with your favorite slimes like: pink, tabby, and phosphor. Sit down and relax in a field of flowers or take a dip in a puddle slime-filled pond. The VR Playground is a unique Slime Rancher experience created especially for VR. It does not include the entirety of the original game.
